title: Language Education Curriculum Utilizing Digital Comic Learning Media Based on Sasak Regional Wisdom

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and secondary-level proficiency in native language
context.additional_context: Offline education conducted in a BYOD environment, utilizing digital comic media reflecting local wisdom for language learning

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize at least 20 vocabulary terms related to Sasak regional wisdom using digital comic media
Learners can understand cultural contexts within digital comics and use appropriate expressions in communication scenarios based on this understanding
Learners can provide feedback on usability and educational effectiveness of digital comic learning media through formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
